column5: Hi all, wondering how far a walk it is from Gilford shoreline out to the perch grounds.  Went out with a hut operator this weekend, but in the back of the wagon, couldnt see.  Thanks in advance.
get a smart phone with a map or even better with Navionics did u catch anything ?
Head out near the shanty town... you'll probably catch plenty of perch.
As said,look for the crowds.8/10,you should do all right!
Thanks for the replies..how far a walk do you think it is?  A kilometre?
you'll probably walk further from your parking spot to shore than from shore to the perch grounds.  a 10-15 min walk from shore should get you pretty close.  Ryan
